alert.note: Alert for Middlesex; Norfolk; Suffolk (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 05 at 4:28PM EDT until August 05 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 500 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN NORFOLK...SUFFOLK AND EAST CENTRAL MIDDLESEX COUNTIES... At 426 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Brookline, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Amateur radio and trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Between 411 and 420 PM, multiple reports of trees and power lines down in Milton in Waltham, Milton, Westwood, West Roxbury and Roslindale MA. Locations impacted include... Boston, Cambridge, Quincy, Newton, Somerville, Brookline, Medford, Revere, Arlington, Everett, Braintree, Chelsea, Watertown, Milton, Belmont and Winthrop. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
